modules.title: Understanding SalarySe & Value Proposition
content: SalarySe is India's leading salary-powered fintech platform partnered with RBL Bank.
Our flagship product: RBL SalarySe UP Virtual Credit Card – instant approval, UPI-ready.

quiz.q: What is the SalarySe flagship product?
options: RBL SalarySe UP Virtual Credit Card
quiz.rationale: The flagship product is the SalarySe UP Virtual Credit Card.
UPI allows seamless credit card-linked transactions.

quiz.q: What does the 'S' in STAR stand for?
quiz.rationale: The STAR framework begins with 'Start with Impact'.

quiz.q: Which step creates urgency in STAR?

modules.title: The Perfect Opening (First 30 Seconds)
content: Your first 30 seconds determine call success.
Use confident tone, value-driven statement, and establish urgency.

quiz.q: Which of these is the best opening?
options: "Hi, do you want a credit card?"
"Good afternoon! This is Raj from SalarySe. We have an exclusive virtual card offer just for salaried employees. May I take 2 minutes to explain?"
"Hey, are you free? I want to sell a card."
quiz.rationale: A professional, value-driven opener builds credibility quickly.

assessment.rationale: SalarySe focuses on salary-powered financial products.
SalarySe partners with RBL Bank for its flagship credit card.
